-func getOneRepo(client *github.Client, repo string) ([]github.Repository, error) {
+func getOneRepo(client *github.Client, repo string) ([]*github.Repository, error) {
 	bits := strings.SplitN(repo, "/", 2)
 	if len(bits) != 2 {
 		return nil, fmt.Errorf("Bad repository: %s", repo)
 	}

 		return nil, err
 	}
-	return []github.Repository{*ghRepo}, nil
+	return []*github.Repository{ghRepo}, nil
 }
